publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5268 Dr Richard Simpson: Scotland Rugby Victoryâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Andy Robinson, all 22 players and the other coaches for the victory over Australia, achieved by one of the best defensive efforts ever seen by a Scottish team, and wishes the team every success in the forthcoming match against Argentina.
S3M-5268 Scotland Rugby Victory (lodged on 24 November 2009) Jack McConnell*
